attributes.action: Not to remove The Palace of Westminster from the Freedom of Information Act.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exempting the Palace from the Act would mean that No Minister or MP would have to disclose his salary or expenses. Any person who recieves these items from the Tax payer should be fully responsible to the Tax payer and therefore have to disclose said items when requested to do so by any member of the public. I therefore request Mr Prime Minister that you reject this members bill.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not to remove The Palace of Westminster from the Freedom of Information Act."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15668.asp

Prime Minister's Office
